trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Yorba Linda
There were no other sightings in Yorba Linda on or around July 10th 2008
Summary: Saw a star-like object travel across the sky at a high rate of speed
divs: Sighting DetailsI was sitting in the backyard just looking up at the stars. We don't see very many in Orange County. Then I noticed a small circle of light traveling across the night sky. I knew it wasn't a plane because it had no other lights on it but also it was higher than any plane I've have ever seen. It was very high up in the sky but I could see it was traveling at a very high rate of speed as I saw it cover a long distance in a short amount of time. I don't believe it was a comet as I did not see any type of trail coming off it. Whatever it was it caught my attention.
